title: purpose of giving further effect to Article 15 of Regulation (EU) No 1380/2013
heading: 1. These Regulations may be cited as the Sea-Fisheries (North Western
text_raw:
1. These Regulations may be cited as the Sea-Fisheries (North Western 

Waters Landing Obligation) (Amendment) Regulations 2023.
text_norm: 1 regulation may cited sea-fisheries (north western water landing obligation) (amendment) regulation 2023

title: purpose of giving further effect to Article 15 of Regulation (EU) No 1380/2013
heading: 2. The Sea-Fisheries (North Western Waters Landing Obligation)
text_raw:
2. The Sea-Fisheries (North Western Waters Landing Obligation) 
Regulations 2021 (S.I. No. 101 of 2021) are amended in Regulation 2(1) by the 
insertion after “25 August 2021” (as inserted by the Sea-Fisheries (North 
Western Waters Landing Obligation) (Amendment) Regulations 2022 (S.I. No. 
224 of 2022)) in the definition of “Commission Regulation” of the following: 

“and Commission Delegated Regulation (EU) 2022/2290 of 19 August 2022”.
text_norm: 2 sea-fisheries (north western water landing obligation) regulation 2021 (s.i no 101 2021) amended regulation 2(1) insertion 25 august 2021 (as inserted sea-fisheries (north western water landing obligation) (amendment) regulation 2022 (s.i no 224 2022)) definition commission regulation following commission delegated regulation (eu) 2022 2290 19 august 2022

title: purpose of giving further effect to Article 15 of Regulation (EU) No 1380/2013
heading: 3. The Sea-Fisheries (North Western Waters Landing Obligation)
text_raw:
3. The Sea-Fisheries (North Western Waters Landing Obligation) 

(Amendment) Regulations 2022 (S.I. No. 224 of 2022) are revoked. 

GIVEN under my Official Seal, 

8 February, 2023. 

CHARLIE MCCONALOGUE, 

Minister for Agriculture, Food and the Marine. 

1 OJ L 354, 28.12.2013, p. 22 
2 OJ L 133, 29.5.2015, p.1 
3 OJ L 302, 17.11.2017, p. 1 
4 OJ L 198, 25.7.2019, p. 105 
5 OJ L 303, 23.11.2022, p. 12 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
“Iris Oifigiúil” of 17th February, 2023. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [47] 3

title: purpose of giving further effect to Article 15 of Regulation (EU) No 1380/2013
heading: (This note is not part of the instrument and does not purport to be a legal
text_raw:
EXPLANATORY NOTE 

(This note is not part of the instrument and does not purport to be a legal 
interpretation.) 

These Regulations give effect to Commission Delegated Regulation (EU) 
2022/2290 of 19 August 2022 amending Delegated Regulation (EU) 
2020/2015 as regards certain exemptions to the Landing obligation in Western 
Waters for 2023. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 4 [47]
